video.title: The Spoils of Babylon
video.synopsis: A send-up of romantic potboiler miniseries of the past, this star-studded, six-part saga focuses on the complex lives of the oil-rich Morehouse clan.

episodes.synopsis: As Jonas Morehouse struggles to build his oil empire, his daughter, Cynthia, engages in a clandestine romance with Devon, her adopted brother.
episodes.title: The Foundling

episodes.synopsis: Cynthia Morehouse fears she'll lose her secret lover, her adopted brother, Devon, either to another woman or to the impending war.
episodes.title: The War Within

episodes.synopsis: When she learns that Devon has fallen in love with the comely Lady Anne, a jealous Cynthia takes drastic measures to teach her former lover a lesson.
episodes.title: Kicking the Habit

episodes.synopsis: While the Morehouse empire thrives, the love and animosity between Devon and Cynthia threaten to destroy both their lives.
episodes.title: The Rise of the Empire

episodes.synopsis: Cynthia visits Devon and is shocked to find that he has another guest: Dixie Melonworth, who is madly in love with him.
episodes.title: The Age of the Bastard

episodes.synopsis: Cynthia's son, Winston, plots to destroy the family business, and a Christmas gathering reunites Devon, Cynthia, and special guest, the Shah of Iran.
episodes.title: So Sweet the Bells
